name: Paint The Wall!
description:
PAINT The Wall!

Are you ready to paint walls?

Do you say that it is very easy?

Are you a good painter of fat brush?

I have to paint a few walls, i think they are 53 - almost anything! -. Your job will be to paint the 53 levels from ceiling to the floor, if possible overcoming obstacles, animals and chunks of plaster that can fall on you or any obstacle, - zombies and vampires no i'm told -. You will find bonus extra ( orange, banana, apple, grapes, strawberry, plums, ... ), and assist ( antidote freeze with animals, scooter to increase the speed, extra-time, insecticide to stun, ...)

"PAINT The Wall!" is an arcade game. Time is limited and painting is scarce. Can you help me?

Features:

  • It's very easy to lern how to play it.
  • Directions ( left, right, up and down ).
  • You should paint a percentage of the wall and thus to the next level.
  • Static and dynamic obstacles! with cockroaches, spiders, ants, flies, mosquitoes, lamps, lights, mirrors, plugs, switches, skirting boards, doors, windows, spiderwebs, chunks of stucco, wallpaper and more.
  • Remember!, don't touch the plugs.
  • Extra-Time, speed, immune ( kill flies, mosquitoes, cockroaches, spiders and spiderweb shot ) and more.
  • Many types of walls.
  • 53 different levels with Extra-Bonus, with increasing difficulty.
